article_title: Who were the Israeli hostages mistakenly killed by the IDF?
sentence: Who  were  the  Israeli  hostages  mistakenly  killed  by  the  IDF?

article_title: Who were the Israeli hostages mistakenly killed by the IDF?
sentence: As  you  will  have  seen  from  our  earlier  reporting,  three  men  who  had  been  taken  to  Gaza  from  Israel  by  Hamas  during  their  7  October  attacks  have  been  mistakenly  killed  by  Israeli  forces.
